title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Arc-V
resume: Yu-Gi-Oh! Arc-V is the fourth main spin-off of the Yu-Gi-Oh! series. Yuya Sakaki is a student who is learning to become an entertainment duelist at the You Show Duel School. He gains access to a new power during an exhibition match against the current champion but that is only the beginning of the mysteries in store for him and his friends.
